when.expression: ASD.EFFECTIVE_DATE BETWEEN '${ec.l10n.format(fromDate, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss', null, ec.entity.databaseTimeZone)}' AND '${ec.l10n.format(thruDate, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss', null, ec.entity.databaseTimeZone)}'

ASD.ASSET_RECEIPT_ID IS NOT NULL AND ASD.RETURN_ID IS NOT NULL AND ASD.EFFECTIVE_DATE BETWEEN '${ec.l10n.format(fromDate, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss', null, ec.entity.databaseTimeZone)}' AND '${ec.l10n.format(thruDate, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss', null, ec.entity.databaseTimeZone)}'

ASD.ASSET_RECEIPT_ID IS NOT NULL AND ASD.SHIPMENT_ID IS NOT NULL AND ASD.RETURN_ID IS NULL AND ASD.EFFECTIVE_DATE BETWEEN '${ec.l10n.format(fromDate, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss', null, ec.entity.databaseTimeZone)}' AND '${ec.l10n.format(thruDate, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss', null, ec.entity.databaseTimeZone)}'

ASD.ASSET_RECEIPT_ID IS NOT NULL AND ASD.WORK_EFFORT_ID IS NOT NULL AND ASD.SHIPMENT_ID IS NULL AND ASD.EFFECTIVE_DATE BETWEEN '${ec.l10n.format(fromDate, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss', null, ec.entity.databaseTimeZone)}' AND '${ec.l10n.format(thruDate, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss', null, ec.entity.databaseTimeZone)}'

ASD.ASSET_RECEIPT_ID IS NOT NULL AND ASD.RETURN_ID IS NULL AND ASD.SHIPMENT_ID IS NULL AND ASD.WORK_EFFORT_ID IS NULL AND ASD.EFFECTIVE_DATE BETWEEN '${ec.l10n.format(fromDate, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss', null, ec.entity.databaseTimeZone)}' AND '${ec.l10n.format(thruDate, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss', null, ec.entity.databaseTimeZone)}'

ASD.ASSET_RECEIPT_ID IS NOT NULL AND ASD.EFFECTIVE_DATE BETWEEN '${ec.l10n.format(fromDate, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss', null, ec.entity.databaseTimeZone)}' AND '${ec.l10n.format(thruDate, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss', null, ec.entity.databaseTimeZone)}'

ASD.ASSET_ISSUANCE_ID IS NOT NULL AND ASD.SHIPMENT_ID IS NOT NULL AND ASD.EFFECTIVE_DATE BETWEEN '${ec.l10n.format(fromDate, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss', null, ec.entity.databaseTimeZone)}' AND '${ec.l10n.format(thruDate, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss', null, ec.entity.databaseTimeZone)}'

ASD.ASSET_ISSUANCE_ID IS NOT NULL AND ASD.WORK_EFFORT_ID IS NOT NULL AND ASD.SHIPMENT_ID IS NULL AND ASD.EFFECTIVE_DATE BETWEEN '${ec.l10n.format(fromDate, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss', null, ec.entity.databaseTimeZone)}' AND '${ec.l10n.format(thruDate, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss', null, ec.entity.databaseTimeZone)}'

ASD.ASSET_ISSUANCE_ID IS NOT NULL AND ASD.SHIPMENT_ID IS NULL AND ASD.WORK_EFFORT_ID IS NULL AND ASD.EFFECTIVE_DATE BETWEEN '${ec.l10n.format(fromDate, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss', null, ec.entity.databaseTimeZone)}' AND '${ec.l10n.format(thruDate, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss', null, ec.entity.databaseTimeZone)}'

ASD.ASSET_ISSUANCE_ID IS NOT NULL AND ASD.EFFECTIVE_DATE BETWEEN '${ec.l10n.format(fromDate, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss', null, ec.entity.databaseTimeZone)}' AND '${ec.l10n.format(thruDate, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss', null, ec.entity.databaseTimeZone)}'

ASD.PHYSICAL_INVENTORY_ID IS NOT NULL AND ASD.EFFECTIVE_DATE BETWEEN '${ec.l10n.format(fromDate, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss', null, ec.entity.databaseTimeZone)}' AND '${ec.l10n.format(thruDate, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss', null, ec.entity.databaseTimeZone)}'

view-entity.description: Used to find total ATP/QOH by lotId with various Asset and Lot based constraints, etc
This is used as a sub-select as a member of the OrderItemSalesSummary and InvoiceItemSalesSummary view entities, may be useful for other finds as well
Find AssetIssuance with Lot and Shipment fields available for constraints/etc, such as finding lot dates on most recent shipment for a customer.
